title: Had around 2800 IP and bought TF and now have 237.
body: Yeah, as the title says. i had around 2800 IP bought TF for 1350 and for some reason now have 237 total, didnt know where to post this but it kinda annoys me cuz it cost like double the IP. Rito Plz.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Entropy the Myr,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xaE7j8HM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-21T11:01:18.193+0000)
>
> Q.Q Tax on 1350 is 1250~?

Riot + Tencent tax.
http://www.auplod.com/u/uopadl6d63e.png
*Drops on both knees and shakes fists to rito gods* NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

> [{quoted}](name=Entropy the Myr,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xaE7j8HM,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-21T11:13:28.930+0000)
>
> *Drops on both knees and shakes fists to rito gods* NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

Try to relog to see if it fix or submit a support ticket.
http://www.auplod.com/u/uopadl6d63e.png

So normally (from what I know), this is just a client-side error. Generally, our side shows the correct amount of IP and the maths going to the client gets lost in the void. Restarting your client usually fixes this issue.

However, if that doesn't fix it and your client is still showing the incorrect IP amount, you can shoot us a support ticket here :3
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

On a separate note, try 45% CDR TF. You pick a gold card, like, every 2 seconds. It's fun. :3

{{champion:4}}: LUCKY THEM
Thanks for the reply, yeah relogging fixed it, and holy crap sounds OP.

>
> So normally (from what I know), this is just a client-side error. Generally, our side shows the correct amount of IP and the maths going to the client gets lost in the void. Restarting your client usually fixes this issue.

> However, if that doesn't fix it and your client is still showing the incorrect IP amount, you can shoot us a support ticket here :3

> On a separate note, try 45% CDR TF. You pick a gold card, like, every 2 seconds. It's fun. :3

please dont tell people... its been my secret since the start.
I dont want people knowing about my super secret omg .

Too late, your freelo secret is out in the open.
http://www.auplod.com/u/uopadl6d63e.png

And here I am wondering how you bought a 3150 champion with 2800 ip.

*sigh* I've been playing this game too long.

> [{quoted}](name=Entropy the Myr,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xaE7j8HM,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-12-21T11:36:16.287+0000)
>
> He was 1350

If you haven't noticed, I did mention I felt old. It's because for several years he was 3150. You might not remember or have been around. Though this doesn't have anything to do with you veing charged double, I think.

Ahh, i thought that was where u were going with your words but still 

Joke
My Head
